00004 #ifndef _XVIMAGERGB_ICC_
00005 #define _XVIMAGERGB_ICC_
00006 
00007 template <class T> class XVImageScalar;
00008 
00009 //-----------------------------------------------------------------------
00010 //  RGBtoScalar conversion function declaration
00011 //-----------------------------------------------------------------------
00012 
00013 template <class T,class T1>
00014 XVImageScalar<T1> RGBtoScalar (const XVImageRGB<T> & image, 
00015                       XVImageScalar<T1> & targ, 
00016                       RGB_Projection proj = XV_RGB_INTENSITY) {
00017 
00018   targ.resize(image);
00019 
00020   XVImageWIterator<T1>  Itarg(targ);
00021   XVImageIterator<T>   Iimage(image);
00022   
00023   switch (proj) {
00024 
00025   case XV_REDBAND:  
00026     for (;!Itarg.end();++Itarg,++Iimage)
00027       *Itarg = (*Iimage).R();
00028     break; 
00029 
00030   case XV_GREENBAND:     
00031     for (;!Itarg.end();++Itarg,++Iimage)
00032       *Itarg = (*Iimage).G();
00033     break; 
00034 
00035   case XV_BLUEBAND: 
00036     for (;!Itarg.end();++Itarg,++Iimage)
00037       *Itarg = (*Iimage).B();
00038     break; 
00039 
00040   case XV_RGB_INTENSITY:
00041     for (;!Itarg.end();++Itarg,++Iimage)
00042       *Itarg = ((*Iimage).R() + (*Iimage).G() + (*Iimage).B())/3;
00043     break; 
00044   }
00045 
00046   return targ;
00047 }
00048 
00049 //-----------------------------------------------------------------------
00050 //  ScalartoRGB conversion function declaration
00051 //-----------------------------------------------------------------------
00052 
00053 // GDH --- this needs to be tweaked a little bit ..
00054 
00055 template <class T,class T1>
00056 XVImageRGB<T1> ScalartoRGB (const XVImageScalar<T> & image, XVImageRGB<T1> & targ) {
00057 
00058   targ.resize(image);
00059   XVImageWIterator<T1>  Itarg(targ);
00060   XVImageIterator<T>   Iimage(image);
00061 
00062   for (;!Itarg.end();++Itarg,++Iimage) {
00063     Itarg->setR((u_char)*Iimage);
00064     Itarg->setB((u_char)*Iimage);
00065     Itarg->setG((u_char)*Iimage);
00066 
00067   }
00068 
00069   return targ;
00070 }

00074 //-----------------------------------------------------------------------

00078 template <class T,class T1>
00079 XVImageRGB<T1> RGBtoRGB (const XVImageRGB<T> & image, XVImageRGB<T1> & targ) {
00080 
00081   // If they're the same, do nothing
00082   //if(image.ImageType() == targ.ImageType()){
00083   //  targ = image;
00084   //  return targ;
00085  // }
00086 
00087   targ.resize(image);
00088 
00089   XVImageWIterator<T1>  Itarg(targ);
00090   XVImageIterator<T>   Iimage(image);
00091   u_char type = targ.ImageType();  
00092   
00093   for (;Itarg.end() == false; ++Itarg, ++Iimage) {
00094         (*Itarg).setR((*Iimage).R());
00095         (*Itarg).setG((*Iimage).G());
00096         (*Itarg).setB((*Iimage).B());
00097   }       
00098   return targ;
00099 }
